skillDetails.name: Charged Hazard
skillDetails.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Poison or Shock to a random enemy.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Poison or Shock to a random enemy.
